subject: Basketball
Wages and Salaries
Free Agents (Sports)
lead_paragraph: As Carmelo Anthony, LeBron James and others decide where they want to play next year, the options are not as open as an ex-leader of the players union thinks they should be.
snippet: As Carmelo Anthony, LeBron James and others decide where they want to play next year, the options are not as open as an ex-leader of the players union thinks they should be.
